body_html:
Having the same problem.
Windows 10
bazel 0.16.1
tensorflow 1.10.1

bazel --output_user_root=build_temp build -c opt --copt=/arch:AVX tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so

got this command from the \tensorflow\tools\ci_build\windows\libtensorflow_cpu.sh
Error message:

Stdout:
Stderr: /usr/bin/bash: patch: Could not find command
and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config:png'

body:
Having the same problem. 
Windows 10
bazel 0.16.1
tensorflow 1.10.1

`bazel --output_user_root=build_temp build -c opt --copt=/arch:AVX tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so`

got this command from the \tensorflow\tools\ci_build\windows\libtensorflow_cpu.sh
Error message:
> Stdout:
> Stderr: /usr/bin/bash: patch: Could not find command
>  and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config:png'
